definition: A dental device used to replace missing teeth, typically made of artificial materials and designed to fit into the mouth. It is commonly used by individuals who have lost their natural teeth and need a removable dental prosthesis for functional and aesthetic purposes.

examples.english: My dental prosthesis is very comfortable.

examples.german: Die Zahnprothese muss regelmäßig gereinigt werden.
examples.english: The dental prosthesis needs to be cleaned regularly.
